TEXT.TITLE: WEDGESTONE REALTY <WDG> ACQUISITION APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: Wedgestone Realty Investors Trust said shareholkders have approved the acquisition of its advisor, Wedgestone Advisory Corp, for 600,000 shares. It said completion is expected to take place April 10. Reuter
